title: New: Ocean Calling – Far West
content: Having drummed up a fair few plays on a rough demo of this track a month or so ago, Ocean Calling aka Bellingham’s Sophie Wilkie has released the full version of Far West, and it doesn’t disappoint. Breathy M83 style vocals, and CHVRCHES-esque synth sections building to an epic, dream-your-heart-out crescendo; from Wilkie’s Facebook posts, there’s an underlying feeling that she perhaps doesn’t appreciate simply how good this track is. Whilst it may only be a first step forward, and an at times hesitant one at that, there’s more than enough here to suggest that Ocean Calling is a name well worth keeping an eye out for in 2014. Check out Far West below, and grab a download from her Bandcamp.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
